tasks.title: React Adapter (Hooks + Providers + Components Bridge)
deliverables: Hooks for conversation/message/presence/call state with suspense-safe loading states.
Error boundaries and fallback UIs for invalid token and disconnection flows.
acceptance_criteria: React adapter wraps core SDK without duplicating transport logic.
Adapters expose typed events and stable hook signatures.

tasks.title: Angular Adapter (Services + Signals/Observables)
deliverables: Angular services for session, chat, presence, and webrtc domains.
Observable/signal wrappers for real-time updates and reconnect status.
AOT-friendly package structure and strict typing.
acceptance_criteria: Angular adapter can run in modern Angular apps without custom webpack hacks.
Real-time event updates remain in sync with socket namespace contracts.

tasks.title: Cross-Framework Parity And Docs
deliverables: Feature parity matrix for react vs angular adapters.
Integration recipes for guarded routes, auth handoff, and token refresh errors.
Version compatibility matrix with core web sdk.
acceptance_criteria: Framework adapters ship with equivalent baseline capabilities.
Parity regression is tracked in release gates.

tasks.title: Theming, SSR Safety, And Hydration Consistency
deliverables: Adapter-level bridge for host application design tokens/theme overrides without forking core SDK.
SSR-safe initialization patterns that avoid window-dependent logic during server render.
Hydration consistency guards for auth/session/socket startup state in React and Angular.
Reference integration tests for SSR-first app setups.
acceptance_criteria: Adapters work in SSR/hybrid rendering setups without hydration mismatch warnings.
Theme overrides are applied through documented token interface.
Framework wrappers remain transport-logic thin and delegate networking to core SDK.
